\subsubsection[main]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}int main (int {\em argc}, \/  char $\ast$$\ast$ {\em argv})}}
\label{application_8c_3c04138a5bfe5d72780bb7e82a18e627}


compile with define NOSLEEP for none 

\begin{Desc}
\item[Parameters:]
\begin{description}
\item[{\em argv\mbox{[}1\mbox{]},:}]total number of heartbeats to issue \item[{\em argv\mbox{[}2\mbox{]},:}]name of log file \item[{\em argv\mbox{[}3\mbox{]},:}]sleep interval between beats \end{description}
\end{Desc}
